statements: SELECT stock_id, stock_name, price, date FROM stock_prices;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT stock_name, price FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT stock_id, stock_name FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT stock_name, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT stock_id, stock_name FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2021-10-01'
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date ASC, price DESC
SELECT stock_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY stock_name HAVING avg_price > 50
SELECT DISTINCT stock_id, stock_name FROM stock_prices WHERE price < 50
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT symbol, MAX(risk) AS max_risk FROM performance_metrics WHERE return > 0 ORDER BY risk DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT symbol, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM stock_prices GROUP BY symbol
SELECT symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM stock_prices WHERE volume > 100000 GROUP BY symbol ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT sp.symbol, pm.return, pm.risk FROM stock_prices AS sp JOIN performance_metrics AS pm ON sp.symbol = pm.symbol AND sp.date = pm.date WHERE pm.return > 0.05 ORDER BY pm.risk ASC
SELECT * FROM stock_prices
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE stock_id = 1
SELECT metric_name, value FROM performance_metrics WHERE stock_id = 2
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance WHERE total_return > 0
SELECT stock_symbol, price, date FROM stock_prices ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 100
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC
SELECT stock_* FROM stock_prices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT p.portfolio_id, pp.total_return, count(*) as metrics_count FROM portfolio_performance p INNER JOIN performance_metrics pm ON p.portfolio_id = pm.stock_id GROUP BY p.portfolio_id, pp.total_return HAVING count(*) > 5

SELECT pp.portfolio_id, pp.total_return, avg(pm.value) as avg_metric_value FROM portfolio_performance pp LEFT JOIN performance_metrics pm ON pp.portfolio_id = pm.stock_id GROUP BY pp.portfolio_id, pp.total_return ORDER BY avg_metric_value DESC
SELECT * FROM stocks;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM portfolio ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value < 0;
SELECT stock_name, stock_quantity FROM stocks WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_name ASC;
SELECT stock_id, stock_price, stock_quantity FROM stocks WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value, risk_level FROM portfolio WHERE total_value > 100000 ORDER BY total_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.8 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT s.stock_name, sh.timestamp, sh.closing_price FROM stocks s INNER JOIN stock_history sh ON s.stock_id = sh.stock_id WHERE sh.volume > 10000 ORDER BY sh.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM stocks;
SELECT symbol, price FROM stocks WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, portfolio_name, owner FROM portfolios WHERE owner='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='buy' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT performance_date, net_asset_value, daily_return FROM performance_metrics WHERE net_asset_value > 100000 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stocks ORDER BY price DESC, volume ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, price, market_cap FROM stocks WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT owner FROM portfolios WHERE created_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT symbol, transaction_date, quantity, price_per_share FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, price_per_share ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT portfolio_id, performance_date, daily_return FROM performance_metrics WHERE net_asset_value > 100000 ORDER BY performance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
